definition: water/river/liquid/beverage/additional charges or income/(of clothes) classifier for number of washes
wheel/disk/ring/steamship/to take turns/to rotate/by turn/classifier for big round objects: disk, or recurring events: round, turn
see 風水輪流轉|风水轮流转[feng1 shui3 lun2 liu2 zhuan4]

sentences.english: The turning direction of this water turbine is overlook clockwise.
sentences.chinese: 水轮机旋向为俯视顺时针。

sentences.english: This article proposes an improved mehodof selecting the desirable type and parameter for a reaction turbine.
sentences.chinese: 本文提出一种改进的反击式水轮机选型方法。

sentences.english: Installation of a working wheel of the hydraulic turbine.
Use of poppet valve in a separate housing parallel to turbine is seldom.
sentences.chinese: 很少有作为单独的外壳，而与水轮机并行的情况。

sentences.english: Cavitation theory does not belong to Pelton turbine.
sentences.chinese: 空化理论不属于水斗式水轮机。

sentences.english: 12 radiaxial hydroelectric generating sets are installed in the hall.
sentences.chinese: 在大厅中的12座水轮发电机组已经安装完毕。

sentences.english: The impulse of falling water turns the waterwheel.
sentences.chinese: 落水的冲力使水轮转动。

sentences.english: Look back the passed history, re-understand the Pelton turbine, look forward its prospect future.
sentences.chinese: 回顾认识水斗式水轮机，展望其未来发展。

sentences.english: The torque of the shafts of turbines and generators was transmitted by friction.
sentences.chinese: 水轮机与发电机大轴靠摩擦传递力矩。

sentences.english: The experimental study on the influence of bucket numbers on the Pelton turbine′s performance was presented.
sentences.chinese: 研究了水斗数对冲击式水轮机性能的影响。

sentences.english: The hydro grates are on the bed of a hog boiler.
sentences.chinese: 水轮发电机炉是在床上的猪锅炉。

sentences.english: There is an image of a silk spinning machine powered by a water wheel that dates to 1313.
sentences.chinese: 一部水轮转动丝绸纺车图像的日期确定为1313年。

sentences.english: As a result, application and practice shows the remarkable advantage effect by taking integrative measures at XLD.
sentences.chinese: 实践证明小浪底水轮机采取的综合抗磨措施效果显著。

sentences.english: Guide bearing of vertical hydrogenerator carries the radial force from its rotatory parts.
sentences.chinese: 立式水轮发电机的导轴承承受转动部件的径向力。

sentences.english: With the development of waterpower resources, the dimension of runner blade of Kaplan turbine is getting larger and larger.
sentences.chinese: 随着水力资源的开发，转桨式水轮机叶片日趋增大。

sentences.english: A motion equation for hydrogenerator set with non-direct connection is established in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 本文中建立了非直联水轮发电机组运动方程。

definition: rotating disk/wheel/rotor/cycle of reincarnation in Buddhism
a forced draft (of wind, for smelting metal)/blast (in blast furnace)/bellows/to draw air using bellows
